---
title: "Benchmarking police numbers in London against other global cities"
date: "2023-03-15"
---

Citation: M Ashby. 2023. _Benchmarking police numbers in London against other global cities_. London: Centre for Global City Policing.

[Published version (open access)](https://discovery.ucl.ac.uk/id/eprint/10183480/){.btn .btn-primary}

This report compares the number of police officers and staff per 10,000 residents in London to the number of officers and staff in 13 other global cities – large cities in developed countries around the world – to better understand the resources available to police in London.
